Title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
Actors: Matt Damon, James Cromwell, Daniel Studi, Chopper Bernet
Plot: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training. Yet throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 21 nominations.
